author: amaltaro
body:
It's actually not working yet, but I can get back to it in the future.

The failure is quite weird, it complains about this path that does not exist (while building isort):
```
/build/amaltaro/w/slc7_amd64_gcc630/external/py2-backports.functools-lru-cache/1.5/etc/profile.d/init.sh: line 2: PY2_BACKPORTS.FUNCTOOLS_LRU_CACHE_ROOT=/build/amaltaro/w/slc7_amd64_gcc630/external/py2-backports.functools-lru-cache/1.5: No such file or directory
```

but I can successfully list that directory
```
amaltaro@vocms055:/build/amaltaro $ ls /build/amaltaro/w/slc7_amd64_gcc630/external/py2-backports.functools-lru-cache/1.5
etc  lib
```

No clue of what happened yet...
title: Build python2 pylint and its dependencies - DO NOT MERGE
